Dressing Room â€º The Dress Enchant is a new system that change your armors or weapon look. *WARNING:* Armor can be enchanted ONLY to the same armor type *(Heavy - Light - Robe)*. Weapon can be enchanted ONLY to the same weapon type *(Sword - Blunt - Staff - etc.)*. After enchanting, these features are saved to your equip. *Enchant level, Attribute, Augmentation* will be saved Equip *can be traded*, visual effect will not disappear.
